0.text: Bug 35156  Ctrl+F1 works only on some fields in the help search.

1.text: OS: Linux - GTK Build: RC2 with IBMJava2-131 JRE  Steps to reproduce: 1.

4.text: Select from the menu bar Search -> Help 3.

5.text: When the window pops up, click on the first text field and press ctrl+F1.

6.text: Expected Result: A help pop up screen should come up displaying information about the Help  Search.

8.text: This occurs on all DBCS languages.

10.text: This event only happens in the first text field.

11.text: When cycling through all  the other fields using the tab key, the ctrl+F1 functions properly by  displaying the correct text.

13.text: The attachment will show exactly which field is not responding to the  ctrl+F1, for it is circled in red.

14.text: The fields circled in green work properly.
